body_html: @junshi15 You mentioned about shared pinned memory, and I am wondering if this could be resolved by increasing the amount of pinned memory permitted for multiple concurrent transmissions. For sake of easier implementation, a memory pool allowing growth may fit your needs, e.g. BFCAllocator or PoolAllocator.
